rules.ruleString: Must be enrolled in course version {2984, 2985, P6003}
For COURSE_CODE IN {P6003} Do Must have passed 4 (I/W) units in {PGW5201, PGW5202, PGW5203, PGW5204} Otherwise true

time: Summer semester A (starts November) 2017 (On-campus block of classes)

description: This is a one week unit conducted on-campus. This program includes clinical observation in Melbourne metropolitan wound clinics and a series of presentations and workshops on specific practical wound skills including vascular assessment, measurement of ankle-brachial pressure index (ABPI) using Doppler, debridement of wounds, compression bandaging, offloading pressure and dressing product selection.
faculty: Faculty of Pharmacy and Pharmaceutical Sciences
